name: GraFi Christmas
description:
GraFi Christmas - casual, colorful, minimalist, physical puzzle with traps, treadmills, portals, Christmas ornaments, snowflakes, snowman's and changing gravity.
Player goal is to relocate red coin, using only the change of gravity, on the red rock and keep for some time to pass the level.

In GraFi Christmas:

- Traps
- Changing gravity
- Cool Soundtrack
- Achievements
- Christmas art
- Treadmills
- Portal's
- Snowman's
- Snowflakes
- 50 levels
